content: this top was inspired by the leaves of lothlorien and the surrounding of an intense green magical forest its airy lace pattern makes it perfect for a warm summer day at the bust and up the pattern is designed to be opaque the pattern is for now only available in one size with a bust circumference of 90 cm measured flat after wet blocking this comfortably fits a bust circumference of 94 cm as shown in the picture the easiest way to adjust the size would be to change the gauge this pattern has not been test knitted so please let me know if something is unclear in the instructions happy knitting linnéa
